And them having regular masturbating sessions means that she will continue to masturbate using AV and hentai materials during her stay in Tokyo. Thus more exposure to knowledge about sex. Mc also said in early pages that they've been masturbating to each other for a long time. Look at how she masturbate, she could have lost her hymen during one of the masturbating sessions. She went to Tokyo for 2 years and came back for him. Although she said he can't get a gf, she is looking forward to be his gf. During the 2 years apart she apparently realised that she was in love with mc hence she did that to make him hers. And her teasing him being a virgin... she already asked him whether he has any gf in her 2 years absence and he replied no, and his reaction when she's being aggressive is enough to tell anyone that he is still a virgin, thus she's teasing him. If you say she's more knowledgeable than him about sex, of course she does. Being a couple of years older than him means she has more exposure to AV and hentai especially when she is in Tokyo

@Twilliji It's the same with all these older sister type stories. People are mad she went and lost her virginity and became a "slut." But I think it works really well as a story. She left home to live her life. Had a couple boyfriends that didn't work out. It just didn't feel right. Goes back, fucks her "brother," ah, this feels right, asks him to be her boyfriend.

@Twilliji this just... seems off. There isn't anything specific about it. They had apparently been doing it for years, then she makes fun of him for being a virgin, and just goes "you should date me" She doesn't seem to care about anything, just rubs me the wrong way.
